categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A pilot using the call sign "Renegade Three" served in the Rebel Alliance as a member of Red Squadron's Renegade Flight under Commander Arhul Narra, who the pilot called by the nickname "Boss", as did many other members of the flight.

In 3 ABY, while escorting a Rebel convoy carrying supplies from Derra IV to Echo Base on Hoth, the Renegades were ambushed by Imperial forces. "Renegade Three" announced to Renegade Leader Narra the death of fellow Renegade Ketku, before being killed along with Narra and the rest of Renegade Flight, as the entire convoy was wiped out.
